content: this legal document explains the progress of a case in the monza bankruptcy court the court has dissolved a real estate partnership and identified specific properties involved including an apartment and a garage some properties were exempted from dissolution by agreement of the parties since the properties cannot be divided among the coowners the court has ordered their sale a final judgment will be made to dispose of the properties the court has also dissolved a joint ownership agreement for an apartment in lissone which consists of three rooms a kitchen a bathroom and a basement cellar the court has identified the details of the property in the cadastre records additionally there is a garage in lissone that can be divided into separate lots the court has ordered the sale of the property through a separate order delegation the courts decision was made on march 8 2013 and deposited in the secretariat on april 2 2013
